title: No Bodoni
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235733/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235733/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : No Bodoni**

[No Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235733/http:/www.nobodoni.com/) is a small, independent type design company, founded by designer [George E. Thompson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235733/http:/typophile.com/wiki/George%20E.%20Thompson), and inspired by [Giambattista Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235733/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Giambattista%20Bodoni)’s dedication and drive.

"I felt bad because I had no shoes, until I met a man who had no Bodoni."

Website: [http://www.nobodoni.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204235733/http:/www.nobodoni.com/ "http://www.nobodoni.com")
author: gthompson
